title: Looking for Bronze 2 to Gold 5 ranked team looking to improve and climb.
body: Looking for a good ranked team to climb the ladder with and improve. I am currently Bronze 2 although am quickly climbing to silver,  can play any position and have many champs. I am also pretty flexible. Would love it if I could join a higher level team like gold so I can improve on my game. I do not rage and have curse voice/skype for communication.

replies.body: bro ill join, i am ADC and jungle main. I just deranked myself from silver 5 to bronze 5 but I'm climbing back up, almost in b4 atm
